rule.q: Do production changes require peer review?

answer: All production changes must be peer‑reviewed and approved before deployment. Emergency changes require documented post‑implementation review. Developers should not have standing write access to production. Changes must be tested in a non‑production environment prior to release.

citations.text: Emergency changes require documented post‑implementation review.
All production changes must be peer‑reviewed and approved before deployment.
Changes must be tested in a non‑production environment prior to release.
Developers should not have standing write access to production.
